formatted_address: 1 Fusionopolis Way #B1-14 Connexis Building, One North MRT, Singapore 138632
name: Traditional Sarawak Kolo Mee Fusionopolis

reviews.text: Auntie was very nice!  Ordered Premium Kolo Mee.  Tastes normal at first when I thought of trying their Chili Oil.  And then the magic happens.  The combination is so good!  The hidden taste was released, I was blown away.  5/5 Will come back!

Great Food, Reasonable Pricing, Polite Service, Spacious Quiet Place to dine and unwind. Please prepare more curry chicken daily! It gets sold out everytime I dropped by to wanna buy but didn't manage to ðŸ˜­ Your Curry Chicken is truly a signature dish ðŸ’–

The picture looks nice, but not the actual presentation. The noodles taste average and slightly bland compared to the original Kuching Kolo Mee, the noodles were overcooked, nowhere near as authentic or traditional as claimed. It may have adapted to local preference. The curry was bad for the price, with one big chunk missing from the drumstick with a lot of potatoes. Pricing may be due to the location and not the portion, not worth coming back.

The foods are delicious. 10/10 ðŸ‘ŒAttached photo I think is my new fav. ðŸ˜Š Looking forward to ordering this again with my fam.
The service is very efficient and the crews are accommodating. The atmosphere adds to the goodness of the foods served. Thank you! I'll highly recommend you to my colleagues.
Great food! And perfect environment setting for Sunday slow breakfast

vicinity: 1 Fusionopolis Way #B1-14 Connexis Building, One North MRT
